description: This file defines Express.js routes for managing healthcare appointments, including listing, creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting appointments with relevant authentication and authorization middleware.

methods.name: router.get
methods.description: Defines a GET endpoint for listing appointments with authentication and role-based authorization.

methods.name: router.post
methods.description: Defines a POST endpoint for creating new appointments with authentication and authorization.

methods.name: router.get('/:id')
methods.description: Retrieves a specific appointment by ID with authentication and role-based access.

methods.name: router.put('/:id')
methods.description: Updates an existing appointment identified by ID with necessary access controls.

methods.name: router.delete('/:id')
methods.description: Deletes an appointment by ID, restricted to admin role.
